name: help
description: Shows the help page, listing all available music commands. If followed with another command: shows info on that command

name: setup
description: Creates the Music Player channel (song requests channel). Channel can be moved and renamed once created

name: dj
description: `add`, `remove`, `show` or `clear` DJ roles. `add`/`remove` require a role ID. Members with a DJ role have the ability to use Playback/Queue commands such as `pause`, `skip`, `shuffle`, `remove` etc..

name: history
description: Shows history of played tracks on the current server

name: join
description: Joins VC with you if you're currently in VC

name: leave
description: Leaves VC channel
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: notify
description: Enables or disables "Playing now..." messages that are sent whenever a new track starts playing. You can use this to change the notifying channel (by sending it to where you want the notifications to be sent)
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: play
description: Provided with a track name, I will search for it and queue the track. If provided with a Youtube, Spotify or Soundcloud link for a single track or a playlist, I will add the track/playlist to the queue

name: search
description: Provided with a track name, I will search for it on Youtube and return the top 5 results for the user to choose from. Chosen track gets queued

name: pause
description: Pauses playback but stays connected to voice channel. Resume by using `resume` command
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: resume
description: Resumes playback if paused
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: player
description: Shows the minimal Music player embed, detailing currently played track in addition to information related to the player

name: progress
description: Shows progress on current track. Might not be very accurate
short_description: Show progress on the current track

name: seek
description: Seeks to timestamp in the currently played track. Provide with timestamp of format mm:ss or hh:mm:ss
short_description: Seek to a timestamp in the played track
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: lyrics
description: Searches for lyrics for current track and sends them if found
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: playNow
description: This command works the same way as the `play` command, except that track is queued to be played immediately, skipping current track. Accepts only single tracks and not playlists
short_description: Play now/immediately, skip current track. Only provide a single track
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: replay
description: Replays the current track from start
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: queue
description: Lists currently queued tracks

name: clear
description: Clears queued tracks
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: move
description: Takes 2 numbers. Moves track at index #1 to index #2, pushing back other tracks from index #2
short_description: Move a track inside the queue
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: skip
description: Skips currently played track
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC, otherwise I will hold a majority vote

name: loop
description: Changes loop mode. Cycles through the 3 modes if not provided with a subcommand (`all`, `one`, `none`)
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: shuffle
description: Shuffles the queue
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC

name: remove
description: Provided with a track number, removes the track from queue
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC, or if the track to be removed was not queued by the same member

name: skipTo
description: Skips to a track on the given index
short_description: Skip to a track on the given index
further_details: Needs DJ role if more than one member in VC, otherwise I will hold a majority vote
